Do you know their National Insurance number?

It's on their National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60. For example, 'QQ 12 34 56 C'.

Why we ask for their National Insurance number

We can use their National Insurance number to see if they currently hold a record with us. This may help us process their application faster.

Providing this is optional and does not affect their eligibility to apply for a PRC.
